name: Goalie(WhatToDo)
0:
”Alexa, open Goalie Goals.”
”Alexa, open Goalie Goals for productive”
”Alexa, open Goalie Goals for fun”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: goalie goals
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get some suggestions on what Productive or Fun things to do. If you have extra time on your hands or just need some tips on how to spend your time. Use What To Do, and this skill will offer useful suggestions on what you can do. Tasks are organized in 2 categories: Productive or Fun. Use "Again" or "Next" to navigate suggestions.

Controls:
"Alexa, open Goalie Goals"
"Productive/Fun"
"Again/Next"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
